name: Container - Adjustable Width
description: Use this container to wrap full width components in. Can be adjusted to full screen, XXL (2048), XL (1660), Large (1440), Medium (1024), or Small (640px). Options for applying margins above and below the container and padding to the left and right are also available.

attribute_definition_groups.name: Container Max Width
attribute_definition_groups.description: What is the max-width this container should be allowed to grow to?

attribute_definitions.name: Container Max Width
attribute_definitions.description: The max-width the container is allowed to grow across all device widths.

attribute_definition_groups.name: Spacing Around Container
attribute_definition_groups.description: What margin and padding, if any should be added to the outside of the container?
